attributes.action: Proceed with proposals for road pricing (including congestion charging) with all speed and ignore the current petition to the contrary supported by only 2% of the population.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The current petition seeking to have the government scrap its road pricing proposals is supported by only 2% of the population and has been given disproportionate publicity.  That petition should therefore be ignored.  Road pricing is the only means of reducing congestion on our roads, thus reducing carbon emissions and helping us to breathe-easy.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
